EmailTemplate.name: School Photographs Delivered.
EmailTemplate.subject: School Photographs Delivered.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
The British School of Guangzhou
Dear Parents,
Please note that if you ordered/purchased school photographs at the end of term 1, these now should have been delivered to you by your child.
If you ordered/purchased school photographs but have not received them as yet, please contact the school receptionists for assistance.
Kind regards,
Administration Team
The British School of Guangzhou
World Class Education
____________________________________________________________
A Nord Anglia Education School - University of Cambridge Examination Centre - Member of The Federation of British International Schools In Asia (FOBISIA)- Member of the Council of British International Schools (COBIS) - Member of the Council of International Schools (CIS) - Licensed by the Chinese Ministry of Education
